mapper.select: SELECT MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION_ID, MEETING_TIME, MEETINGROOM_ID, SCHEDULE_ID FROM TBL_MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION
SELECT MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION_ID, MEETING_TIME, MEETINGROOM_ID, SCHEDULE_ID FROM TBL_MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION WHERE MEETINGROOM_ID = #{meetingRoomId}

SELECT r.MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION_ID, r.MEETING_TIME, r.MEETINGROOM_ID, r.SCHEDULE_ID FROM TBL_MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION r JOIN TBL_MEETINGROOM m ON r.MEETINGROOM_ID = m.MEETINGROOM_ID WHERE m.MEETINGROOM_PLACE = #{meetingRoomPlace}

SELECT r.MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION_ID AS meetingroom_reservation_id, r.MEETING_TIME AS meeting_time, s.TITLE AS title, s.START_TIME AS start_time, s.END_TIME AS end_time, r.MEETINGROOM_ID AS meetingroom_id, r.SCHEDULE_ID AS schedule_id, us.STATUS AS status,
s.USER_ID AS user_id, m.MEETINGROOM_PLACE AS meetingroom_place FROM TBL_MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION r JOIN TBL_SCHEDULE s ON r.SCHEDULE_ID = s.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN TBL_MEETINGROOM m on r.MEETINGROOM_ID = m.MEETINGROOM_ID JOIN TBL_USER_SCHEDULE us ON us.SCHEDULE_ID = s.SCHEDULE_ID JOIN TBL_USER u ON us.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE r.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
